forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. South southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the cool embrace of the overnight hours, Downtown San Francisco rests beneath a mostly clear sky, the air crisp and inviting, around a refreshing 46 degrees. A soft whisper of a breeze dances from the south-southwest, hardly more than a gentle caress. As dawn breaks and Saturday unveils itself, the sun promises a bright day ahead, heralding temperatures that will rise to a modest 60 degrees before gently retreating to 57 in a tender afternoon descent. The quiet winds, playful yet unassuming at 2 to 6 mph, hint at a day free of tempestuous weather, lending an air of serene constancy to the urban landscape.

With the absence of fog or a stubborn marine layer, the vistas open wide, allowing a splendid panorama of the city skyline and the distant silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge. It’s an ideal moment to wander through the soft morning light, perhaps taking a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or sipping coffee in a sunlit café, savoring the clean aroma of the day as it unfolds. Attire should be comfortably layered; a light sweater or jacket will suffice to fend off the morning chill while welcoming the gentle warmth of the afternoon sun. Gather your thoughts amidst the quiet beauty of this urban oasis, and seize the day as it gifts you its clarity and promise.
